string.value: #b#p2081003##k says he found a good place to hatch Freezer.
#p2081003# thinks the highest nest in the sky should be able to hatch it. Sounds good. Let's go there. \n\n#o9300090# #r#a62431#
I can use the power of Frostprey now!
It should be able to hatch in a nice place where it can open its wings. A modest wind, large, open space...I've got it!
I found a place to hatch Frostprey. The Sky nest. The highest nest is the perfect place to hatch Frostprey. It's not too high for you I believe...

Take the egg there. Hurry! Wake #r#o9300090##k up. I'd go with you, but I don't have my longjohns on...besides, I feel that you should reap the reward...if you're strong enough that is...so what do you say?
Ok, then hurry up! Wake #r#o9300090##k up. Be careful though, #o9300090# might attack you the second it hatches!
Ah! This is #o9300090#! Sturdy beak! Ouch! Cold feathers! Eyes as cold as winter itself! Fantastic!
#o9300090# hatched, thanks to you. As much as I'd like to look after this creature, it belongs to you now.

Did this magnificent bird attack you? I thought it might! They tend to have strong identities so they don't recognize, or obey, humans unless defeated by one. Because you won, he decided to follow you. I envy your strength! I should gone to the sky nest. You can even raise #o9300090# so it will assist you in battle! I am so jealous...this is fine bird, don't you think?
Take care of it please. Show it to me some day when you've grown strong! Thank you.
Still waiting for it to hatch? Come on, you can do it!
